mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT BF.BOARD_FILE_ID,BF.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, BF.FILE_CREATE_DATE, B.BOARD_WRITER, BF.FILE_EXTENSION,BF.SAVE_FILE_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_FILE BF ON B.BOARD_ID = BF.BOARD_ID JOIN PROJECT_ATTEND PA ON B.PROJECT_ID = PA.PROJECT_ID WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} ORDER BY BOARD_FILE_ID DESC
